page.title: 19 FARMLAND
page.content: 40 farms occupy the area surveyed, the majority of which fall into the intensively managed grassland Category.They range from Hill Farm owned by the Leeswood Hall Estate with over 300 cattle in as many acres, to Bryn-y-pys which has no animals and only extends 4 acres.Below are sample farms from this area.
